amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit spending on the Long Range Standoff weapon (LRSO) until the Administration submits a Nuclear Posture Review to Congress including a detailed assessment of the weapon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to limit spending on the Long Range Standoff weapon (LRSO) until the Administration submits a Nuclear Posture Review to Congress including a detailed assessment of the weapon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 254 (Roll no. 364).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 254 (Roll no. 364).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
